ygData.subject: Re: Players..
ygData.msgSnippet: The number of ppl on the server depends on what time of day you log on.  Ive seen it around 200 ppl all the way to over 1000 at peak hours.  The number of ppl
ygData.messageBody:
The number of ppl on the server depends on what time of day you
log on. Ive seen it around 200 ppl all the way to over 1000 at peak
hours. The number of ppl playing is listed on the server selection
screen.

M

A man says to the Unverse,'Sir, I exist.'
Mark E. Davis The Universe replied,'However that
Mark@... does not create in me any sense of
obligation.' --Stephen Crane
